name: Upward Turn
description:
----- PLOT AND SETTING -----

Long ago this nameless cave was considered a place of many lost treasures and it would attract all kinds of people. Some had good intentions of sharing the fabulous wealth. Whereas some had selfish reasons of ambitious enrichment. Nevertheless, no matter the motives, in the end, they found all the same fate. A long time has passed since the last person was known to be seeking this cave. So long in fact, that it was forgotten.

So what happens when a Hitodama awakes to find itself lost in a dark place? It’s your job to help Hitodama find other lost souls and help them. Some will be grateful for your aid, but others will have twisted cores and evil intentions. Save as many as you can and escape this cursed cave! Hitodama’s peace depends on how successful you are on this quest.

----- CREDITS -----
